src: myiasis is the infestation of organs and tissues of human and animals with fly larvae . this article reports an 18 year - old man with urogenital myiasis , the passing of live megaselia scalaris larvae in the urine , from zanjan city , northwest of iran . we discourse the importance of diagnosis and management of urogenital myiasis in medicine .
mt: Questo articolo riporta di un uomo di 18 anni con myiasi urogenitale , il passaggio di larve vive di megaselia scalaris nelle urine , dalla città di zanjan , a nord-ovest dell' Iran . discorgiamo sull'importanza della diagnosi e della gestione della myiasi urogenitale nella medicina .
pert_mt: Questo articolo riporta di un uomo di 18 anni con myiasi urogenitale, il passaggio di larve morte di megaselia scalaris nelle urine, dalla città di zanjan, a nord-ovest dell'Iran. discorgiamo sull'importanza della diagnosi e della gestione della myiasi urogenitale nella medicina .
bt: This article reports on an 18-year-old man with urogenital myasthenia gravis, the passage of dead larvae of megaselia scalaris in the urine, from the city of Zanjhan, northwest Iran.
questions_src: What is myiasis?
Who can be infested with fly larvae?
Where did the patient live?
When was the patient diagnosed?
Which type of fly larvae was found in the urine?
answers_src: myiasis is the infestation of organs and tissues of human and animals with fly larvae.
answers_bt: Myiasis is the infestation of living tissue by fly larvae.
Fly larvae can infest humans, animals, and plants.

src: neurolinguistic programming ( nlp ) refers to the science and art of reaching success and perfection . it is a collection of the skills based on human beings psychological characteristics through which the individuals obtain the ability to use their personal capabilities as much as possible . this study aimed to investigate the efficacy of nlp training on mental health in nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university tehran medical sciences branch.in this quasi - experimental study , the study population comprised all nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university , tehran medical branch , of whom 52 were selected and assigned to two groups through random sampling .
mt: La programmazione neurolinguistica (NLP) si riferisce alla scienza e all'arte di raggiungere il successo e la perfezione . è una raccolta di competenze basate sulle caratteristiche psicologiche degli esseri umani attraverso le quali gli individui ottengono la capacità di utilizzare le loro capacità personali al massimo . Questo studio mirava ad indagare sull'efficacia della formazione nlp sulla salute mentale negli studenti di infermieristica e di ostetricia nella branca delle scienze mediche dell' islamic university di Tehran.In questo studio quasi sperimentale , la popolazione di studio comprendeva tutti gli studenti di infermieristica e ostetricia dell' islamic university of azad , ramo medico di Tehran , di cui 52 sono stati selezionati e assegnati a due gruppi attraverso campionamento casuale .
pert_mt: La programmazione neurolinguistica (NLP) non si riferisce alla scienza e all'arte di raggiungere il successo e la perfezione. è una raccolta di competenze basate sulle caratteristiche psicologiche degli esseri umani attraverso le quali gli individui ottengono la capacità di utilizzare le loro capacità personali al massimo. Questo studio mirava ad indagare sull'efficacia della formazione nlp sulla salute mentale negli studenti di infermieristica e di ostetricia nella branca delle scienze mediche dell' islamic university di Tehran. In questo studio quasi sperimentale, la popolazione di studio comprendeva tutti gli studenti di infermieristica e ostetricia dell' islamic university of azad, ramo medico di Tehran, di cui 52 sono stati selezionati e assegnati
bt: Neurolinguistic programming (NLP) does not refer to the science and art of achieving success and perfection. it is a collection of skills based on the psychological characteristics of human beings through which individuals obtain the ability to use their personal abilities to the fullest. this study aimed to investigate the effectiveness of the nlp training on mental health in students of nursing and obstetrics in the medical sciences branch of the Islamic University of Tehran. in this quasi-experimental study, the study population included all students of nursing and obstetrics at the Islamic University of Azad, Tehran Medical Branch, of which 52 were selected and assigned.
questions_src: What is neurolinguistic programming (NLP) defined as in the given sentence?
Who is the study aimed to investigate the efficacy of NLP training on?
Where did the quasi-experimental study take place?
Which nursing and midwifery students were selected for the study?
Which branch of Islamic Azad University conducted the study?
answers_src: neurolinguistic programming (NLP) refers to the science and art of reaching success and perfection.
islamic azad university tehran medical sciences branch
answers_bt: does not refer to the science and art of achieving success and perfection.
students of nursing and obstetrics in the medical sciences branch of the Islamic University of Tehran.
Islamic Azad University, Tehran Medical Branch.
medical sciences branch of the Islamic University of Tehran.

src: this pilot study tested the effect of cognitive behavioral therapy ( cbt ) on parent - reported autism symptoms . nineteen children with autism spectrum disorders and an anxiety disorder ( 711 years old ) were randomly assigned to 16 sessions of cbt or a waitlist condition . the cbt program emphasized in vivo exposure supported by parent training and school consultation to promote social communication and emotion regulation skills .
mt: Questo studio pilota ha testato l'effetto della terapia cognitivo-comportamentale (cbt) sui sintomi di autismo segnalati dai genitori . Diecinque bambini con disturbi dello spettro autistico e un disturbo d'ansia (a 711 anni) sono stati assegnati in modo casuale a 16 sessioni di cbt o una condizione di lista di attesa . Il programma cbt ha sottolineato l'esposizione in vivo sostenuta da formazione dei genitori e consultazione scolastica per promuovere la comunicazione sociale e le capacità di regolazione delle emozioni .
pert_mt: Questo studio pilota ha testato l'effetto della terapia fisica (cbt) sui sintomi di autismo segnalati dai genitori. Diecinque bambini con disturbi dello spettro autistico e un disturbo d'ansia (a 711 anni) sono stati assegnati in modo casuale a 16 sessioni di cbt o una condizione di lista di attesa. Il programma cbt ha sottolineato l'esposizione in vivo sostenda da formazione dei genitori e consultazione scolastica per promuovere la comunicazione sociale e le capacità di regolazione delle emozioni.
bt: This pilot study has tested the effect of physical therapy (cbt) on autism symptoms reported by parents.Five children with autism spectrum disorder and an anxiety disorder (aged 711) were randomly assigned to 16 sessions of cbt or a waiting list condition.The cbt program emphasized the in vivo exposure supports parental training and school counseling to promote social communication and the ability to regulate emotions.
questions_src: What was the main goal of the pilot study?
Who were the participants in the study?
Where were the children with autism spectrum disorders assigned?
When did the 16 sessions of CBT take place?
Which skills did the CBT program focus on promoting?
answers_src: To test the effect of cognitive behavioral therapy on parent-reported autism symptoms.
Nineteen children with autism spectrum disorders and an anxiety disorder.
To 16 sessions of CBT or a waitlist condition.
Social communication and emotion regulation skills.
answers_bt: To test the effect of physical therapy (CBT) on autism symptoms reported by parents.
Five children with autism spectrum disorder and an anxiety disorder aged 7-11.
social communication and the ability to regulate emotions.

src: rnaomics , analogous to proteomics , concerns aspects of the secondary and tertiary structure , folding pathway , kinetics , comparison , function and regulation of all rna in a living organism . given recently discovered roles played by micro rna , small interfering rna , riboswitches , ribozymes , etc . , it is important to gain insight into the folding process of rna sequences .
mt: La rnaomics , analogo alla proteomics , riguarda aspetti della struttura secondaria e terziaria , della via di ripiegamento , della cinetica , del confronto , della funzione e della regolazione di tutti i rna in un organismo vivente . Dati i ruoli recentemente scoperti svoltosi da micro rna , piccoli rna interferenti , riboswitches , ribozyme , ecc , è importante acquisire una conoscenza del processo di ripiegamento delle sequenze rna .
pert_mt: La rnaomics, analogo alla proteomics, riguarda aspetti della struttura secondaria e terziaria, della via di ripiegamento, della cinetica, del confronto, della funzione e della regolazione di tutti i rna in un organismo vivente. Dati i ruoli recentemente scoperti svoltisi da micro rna, piccoli rna interferenti, riboswitches, ribozyme, ecc, è importante non acquisire una conoscenza del processo di ripiegamento delle sequenze rna.
bt: Rnaomics, like proteomics, deals with aspects of secondary and tertiary structure, folding pathways, kinetics, comparison, function and regulation of all RNAs in a living organism.Given the recently discovered roles of microRNA, small RNA interferents, riboswitches, ribozymes, etc., it is important not to acquire knowledge of the folding process of RNA sequences.
questions_src: What does rnaomics study in a living organism?
Who plays important roles in the folding process of RNA according to the sentence?
Where can one find examples of microRNA, small interfering RNA, riboswitches, and ribozymes mentioned?
When was the recent discovery of these RNA molecules made?
Which aspects of RNA's structure and function are of interest in rnaomics?
answers_src: all RNA in a living organism
microRNA, small interfering RNA, riboswitches, and ribozymes
secondary and tertiary structure, folding pathway, kinetics, comparison, function and regulation
answers_bt: secondary and tertiary structure, folding pathways, kinetics, comparison, function and regulation of all RNAs in a living organism
microRNA, small interfering RNA, riboswitches, ribozymes

src: the rates of initial and long - term patency and of early recurrence were compared.resultsinitial patency rates for the suprapapillary and transpapillary methods were 1/7 ( 14.3% ) and 20/20 ( 100% ) respectively for type a ( p < 0.0001 ) , 4/5 ( 80.0% ) and 2/2 for type b , 3/7 ( 42.9% ) and 2/2 for type c , and 15/16 ( 93.8% ) and 0/0 for type d. early recurrence rates were 7/30 ( 23.3% ) using the suprapapillary method and 4/29 ( 13.8% ) using the transpapillary method ( p = 0.51 ) . the long - term patency rate did not differ significantly according to either type ( p = 0.37 ) or method ( p = 0.62).conclusionfor good initial patency , the transpapillary method is recommended for strictures of the distal extrahepatic duct near the ampulla and just above the bending portion . long - term patency is not influenced by the stenting method employed .
mt: I tassi di patenza iniziale e a lungo termine e di ricorrenza precoce sono stati confrontati.Rescultati tassi di patenza iniziale per i metodi suprapapillari e transpapillari sono stati rispettivamente 1/7 ( 14,3%) e 20/20 (100%) per il tipo a (p < 0,0001) , 4/5 ( 80,0%) e 2/2 per il tipo b , 3/7 ( 42,9%) e 2/2 per il tipo c , e 15/16 ( 93,8%) e 0/0 per il tipo d. I tassi di recorrenza precoce sono stati 7/30 ( 23,3%) utilizzando il metodo suprapapillari e 4/29 ( 13,8%) utilizzando il metodo transpapillari (p = 0,51).
pert_mt: I tassi di patenza iniziale e a lungo termine e di ricorrenza precoce non sono stati confrontati. Recultati tassi di patenza iniziale per i metodi suprapapillari e transpapillari sono stati rispettivamente 1/7 (14,3%) e 20/20 (100%) per il tipo a (p < 0,0001), 4/5 (80,0%) e 2/2 per il tipo b, 3/7 (42,9%) e 2/2 per il tipo c, e 15/16 (93,8%) e 0/0 per il tipo d. I tassi di recorrenza precoce sono stati 7/30 (23,3%) utilizzando il metodo suprapapillari e 4/29
bt: The initial and long-term patent rates and early recurrence rates were not compared.The initial patent rates for the supra-papillary and transpapillary methods were 1/7 (14.3%) and 20/20 (100%) for type a (p < 0.0001), 4/5 (80.0%) and 2/2 for type b, 3/7 (42.9%) and 2/2 for type c, and 15/16 (93.8%) and 0/0 for type d.The early recurrence rates were 7/30 (23.3%) using the supra-papillary method and 4/29.
questions_src: What was the initial patency rate for type A stricture with the transpapillary method?
When did the early recurrence rates start being calculated?
Which method had a higher long-term patency rate for type C stricture?
What was the overall long-term patency rate for type D stricture?
Where are strictures of the distal extrahepatic duct near the ampulla and just above the bending portion typically treated with the transpapillary method?
answers_src: strictures of the distal extrahepatic duct near the ampulla and just above the bending portion

src: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose ( fdg ) positron emission tomography and computed tomography ( integrated fdg pet / ct ) has been used to diagnose recurrence and differentiate postoperative changes from lymph node metastasis in colorectal cancer , although its accuracy is questionable . we report a prone thoracoscopic surgery for a rectal cancer patient in which false - positive mediastinal lymph nodes were found on fdg - pet / ct . a 60-year - old man underwent a laparoscopic high anterior resection and d3 lymph node dissection for rectal cancer .
mt: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose (fdg) positron emission tomography e computed tomography (integrated fdg pet / ct) sono stati usati per diagnosticare la ricorrenza e differenziare i cambiamenti postoperativi dalla metastasi dei linfonodi nel cancro colorretto , anche se la sua accuratezza è discutibile . segnaliamo una tendenza chirurgica toracoscopica per un paziente con cancro al rettale in cui sono stati trovati falsi - positivi linfonodi mediastinali su fdg - pet / ct . un uomo di 60 anni ha subito una resezione laparoscopica alta anteriore e una dissezione dei linfonodi d3 per il cancro al rettale .
pert_mt: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose (fdg) positron emission tomography e computed tomography (integrated fdg pet / ct) sono stati usati per diagnosticare la ricorrenza e differenziare i cambiamenti postoperativi dalla metastasi dei linfonodi nel cancro colorretto , anche se la sua accuratezza non è discutibile . segnaliamo una tendenza chirurgica toracoscopica per un paziente con cancro al rettale in cui sono stati trovati falsi - negativi linfonodi mediastinali su fdg - pet / ct .
bt: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose (fdg) positron emission tomography and computed tomography (integrated fdg pet / ct) have been used to diagnose the recurrence and differentiate and postoperative changes from the metastasis of lymph nodes in colorectal cancer , although its accuracy is not disputed .
questions_src: What is the full name of the patient mentioned in the sentence?
Who was diagnosed with recurrence and lymph node metastasis using fdg-PET/CT?
Where did false-positive mediastinal lymph nodes appear on the patient's imaging?
When was the prone thoracoscopic surgery performed for the rectal cancer patient?
Which procedure was used to diagnose the rectal cancer patient?

src: hypertension is common in hemolytic uremic syndrome ( hus ) and often difficult to control . local renin - angiotensin activation is believed to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , leading to a vicious cycle of progressive renal injury and intractable hypertension . this has been demonstrated in vitro via enhanced tissue factor expression on glomerular endothelial cells which is enhanced by angiotensin ii .
mt: L'attività locale di renina - angiotensina si ritiene sia una parte importante della microangiopatia trombotica , portando ad un ciclo vizioso di lesioni renali progressive e ipertensione intractabile . Questo è stato dimostrato in vitro attraverso un'espressione aumentata del fattore tissutale sulle cellule endoteliche glomerulari che è aumentata dall'angiotensina ii .
pert_mt: L'attività locale di renina - angiotensina si ritiene non sia una parte importante della microangiopatia trombotica , portando ad un ciclo positivo di lesioni renali progressive e ipertensione trattabile . Questo è stato dimostrato in vitro attraverso un'espressione diminuita del fattore tissutale sulle cellule endoteliche glomerulari che è ridotta dall'angiotensina ii .
bt: Local renin-angiotensin activity is not considered to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , leading to a positive cycle of progressive renal injury and treatable hypertension .This has been demonstrated in vitro through a decreased expression of tissue factor on glomerullary endothelial cells that is reduced by angiotensin ii.
questions_src: What is commonly found in hemolytic uremic syndrome?
Who is believed to play a crucial role in thrombotic microangiopathy?
Where has evidence been shown for enhanced tissue factor expression on glomerular endothelial cells?
When does local renin-angiotensin activation occur in relation to renal injury?
Which molecule is suggested to enhance tissue factor expression on glomerular endothelial cells?
answers_src: In the progression of renal injury

src: this makes it difficult to diagnose the onset of disease . such techniques measure only what the clinician wants or expects to see . a technique which can provide more information , regarding the influence of a medical condition upon the body 's whole function , may be invaluable to the clinician .
mt: Questo rende difficile diagnosticare l'inizio della malattia . tali tecniche misurano solo ciò che il medico vuole o si aspetta di vedere . una tecnica che può fornire maggiori informazioni , in merito all'influenza di una condizione medica sull'intera funzione del corpo , può essere inestimabile per il medico .
pert_mt: Questo rende facile diagnosticare l'inizio della malattia. tali tecniche misurano solo ciò che il medico vuole o si aspetta di vedere. Una tecnica che può fornire meno informazioni, in merito all'influenza di una condizione medica sull'intera funzione del corpo, può essere inestimabile per il medico.
bt: This makes it easy to diagnose the onset of the disease, such techniques only measure what the doctor wants or expects to see, and a technique that can provide less information about the influence of a medical condition on the entire function of the body can be invaluable to the doctor.
questions_src: What does the sentence say is difficult to diagnose?
What do such techniques measure?
What type of technique is described as potentially valuable?
When might a technique that provides more information about a medical condition be useful?
Who could benefit from a technique that measures more than just what the clinician wants to see?
answers_bt: what the doctor wants or expects to see
a technique that can provide less information
when a medical condition influences the entire body function

src: [ purpose ] this study compared the analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound therapy in patients with chronic tennis elbow . [ subjects ] fifty patients with tennis elbow were randomized to receive extracorporeal shock wave therapy or ultrasound therapy . [ methods ] the extracorporeal shock wave therapy group received 5 treatments once per week .
mt: [ scopo ] questo studio ha confrontato gli effetti analgesici della terapia con onde d'urto extracorporee con quelli dell' ecografia nei pazienti con gomito cronica di tennis . [ soggetti ] cinquanta pazienti con gomito di tennis sono stati randomizzati per ricevere terapia con onde d'urto extracorporee o terapia con ultrasoni . [ metodi ] il gruppo di terapia con onde d'urto extracorporee ha ricevuto 5 trattamenti una volta alla settimana .
pert_mt: [ scopo ] questo studio ha confrontato gli effetti analgesici della terapia con onde d'urto extracorporee con quelli dell' ecografia nei pazienti con gomito cronica di tennis . [ soggetti ] cinquanta pazienti con gomito di tennis sono stati randomizzati per ricevere terapia con ultrasoni o terapia con onde d'urto extracorporee . [ metodi ] il gruppo di terapia con ultrasoni ha ricevuto 5 trattamenti una volta alla settimana .
bt: This study compared the analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound in patients with chronic tennis elbow . Fifty patients with tennis elbow were randomized to receive ultrasound therapy or extracorporeal shock wave therapy . The ultrasound therapy group received 5 treatments once a week .
questions_src: What was the main subject of the study?
When were the treatments administered?
Where did the study take place?
answers_bt: The analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy and ultrasound in patients with chronic tennis elbow

src: a 43-year - old , who underwent a subtotal hysterectomy for postpartum hemorrhage following a normal delivery , 10 years ago , presented with a history of persistent vaginal discharge and post - coital bleeding . a pap smear reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopic biopsy reported severe dysplasia with crypt extension . the patient underwent a laparoscopic trachelectomy , and histology of the stump reported cervical squamous carcinoma in situ , with no microinvasion .
mt: Una 43enne , che ha subito un' isteretomia subtotale per emorragia postpartum dopo un parto normale , 10 anni fa , ha presentato una storia di scarico vaginale persistente e sanguinamento post-coitale . un esame pap reported moderata displasia , e una successiva biopsia colposcopica reportato grave displasia con estensione della cripta . il paziente ha subito una tracheletomia laparoscopica , e la histologia della stoma ha riferito carcinoma squamo cervicale in situ , senza microinvasione .
pert_mt: Una 43enne , che ha subito un' isteretomia subtotale per emorragia postpartum dopo un parto normale , 10 anni fa , ha presentato una storia di scarico vaginale mancante e sanguinamento post-coitale . un esame pap reported moderata displasia , e una successiva biopsia colposcopica reportato grave displasia con estensione della cripta . il paziente ha subito una tracheletomia laparoscopica , e la histologia della stoma ha riferito carcinoma squamo cervicale invasivo , con microinvasione .
bt: A 43-year-old woman who had undergone a subtotal hysterectomy for postpartum hemorrhage after a normal delivery , 10 years ago , presented a history of missing vaginal scarico and post-coital bleeding . A pap examination reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopica biopsy reported severe dysplasia with cryptographic extension . The patient had undergone a laparoscopic tracheletomy , and the histology of the stomach reported invasive cervical squamo carcinoma , with microinvasione .
questions_src: What type of surgery did the patient undergo 10 years ago?
Who reported the severe dysplasia with crypt extension?
Where was the histology of the stump reported?
When did the patient present with persistent vaginal discharge?
Which cancer diagnosis was reported by histology of the stump?

src: [ purpose ] the purpose of this study was to investigate the differences in symmetry of sitting posture between typical developmental ( td ) children and hemi - cerebral palsy ( cp ) children . [ subjects and methods ] a school chair mounted on a force platform was used to assess the quiet - sitting pressure distribution of 10 td and 10 cp children . [ results ] the symmetry index of the td children was significantly closer to zero than that of the cp children irrespective of the latter group s hemiparetic side . [
mt: [ scopo ] lo scopo di questo studio era di studiare le differenze di simmetria della postura seduta tra i bambini tipici di sviluppo (td) e i bambini con paralisi cerebrale (cp). [ soggetti e metodi ] una sedia di scuola montata su una piattaforma di forza è stata utilizzata per valutare la distribuzione della pressione seduta silenziosa di 10 bambini di sviluppo (td) e 10 bambini di sviluppo (cp). [ risultati ] l'indice di simmetria dei bambini di sviluppo (td) era significativamente più vicino a zero rispetto a quello dei bambini di sviluppo (cp) indipendentemente dal lato emiparatico di quest'ultimo gruppo . [ risultati ]
pert_mt: [ scopo ] lo scopo di questo studio era di studiare le similitudini di simmetria della postura seduta tra i bambini tipici di sviluppo (td) e i bambini con paralisi cerebrale (cp). [ soggetti e metodi ] una sedia di scuola montata su una piattaforma di forza è stata utilizzata per valutare la distribuzione della pressione seduta silenziosa di 10 bambini di sviluppo (td) e 10 bambini di sviluppo (cp). [ risultati ] l'indice di simmetria dei bambini di sviluppo (td) era significativamente più vicino a zero rispetto a quello dei bambini di sviluppo (cp) indipendentemente dal lato emiparatico di quest'ultimo gruppo . [ risultati ]
bt: The purpose of this study was to study the similarities in sitting posture symmetry between typical developmental children (td) and children with cerebral palsy (cp). [ subjects and methods ] a school chair mounted on a force platform was used to evaluate the distribution of silent sitting pressure of 10 developmental children (td) and 10 developmental children (cp). [ results ] the index of developmental children (td) symmetry was significantly closer to zero than that of developmental children (cp) regardless of the semiparatic side of the latter group . [ results ]
questions_src: What is the main purpose of the study?
Who were the subjects in the study?
Where was the pressure distribution assessed?
When was the study conducted?
Which group had a significantly closer symmetry index to zero?
answers_src: investigate the differences in symmetry of sitting posture
a school chair mounted on a force platform
answers_bt: To study the similarities in sitting posture symmetry
Typical developmental children (td) and children with cerebral palsy (cp)
A school chair mounted on a force platform

src: ureterosciatic herniation , the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen , is an extremely rare cause of ureteral obstruction . we describe a case revealed by severe left back pain in a 72-year - old female . she was referred to our hospital for urological assessment of left hydronephrosis observed by ultrasonography .
mt: L' ernia ureterosciatica , la protrusione del sacco di ernia attraverso il forame sciatico , è una causa estremamente rara di ostruzione ureterale . descriviamo un caso rivelato da forti dolori alla schiena sinistra in una donna di 72 anni .
pert_mt: L' ernia ureterosciatica, la protrusione del sacco di ernia attraverso il forame sciatico, non è una causa estremamente rara di ostruzione ureterale. Descriviamo un caso rivelato da forti dolori alla schiena sinistra in una donna di 72 anni.
bt: Ureterosciatic hernia, the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen, is not an extremely rare cause of ureteral obstruction.
questions_src: What is the medical term for the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen that causes ureteral obstruction?
Who was referred to your hospital for urological assessment?
Where did the severe left back pain occur?
When did the patient experience the severe left back pain?
Which patient had left hydronephrosis observed by ultrasonography?

src: resistance to commonly used antibiotics by enterococci causing nosocomial infections is of concern , which necessitates judicious , responsible and evidence - based use of antibiotics . the present study was conducted to review the prevalence and identify therapeutic options for nosocomial enterococcal infections in our tertiary care hospital.isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using kirby - bauer method.153 of 2096 culture positive clinical samples comprised of 101 urine , 30 wound swab / pus , 13 blood and 09 high vaginal swab isolates were identified as enterococcus faecalis ( 90.85% ) , enterococcus faecium ( 8.50% ) and enterococcus gallinarum ( 0.65% ) . enterococci accounted for 8.45% , 4.53% , 4.23% , 4.43% of urinary , wound swab or pus , blood , high vaginal swab isolates respectively , causing 7.3% of all nosocomial infections .
mt: Il presente studio è stato condotto per rivedere la prevalenza e identificare le opzioni terapeutiche per le infezioni enterococciche nosocomie nel nostro ospedale di cure terziarie.I isolati identificati dalle caratteristiche morfologiche e biochimiche sono stati testati per la suscettibilità agli antibiotici utilizzando il metodo kirby-bauer.153 dei 2096 campioni clinici positivi della cultura composti da 101 urine , 30 tamponi / pus , 13 isolati di sangue e 09 tamponi vaginali sono stati identificati come faecalis enterococci (90,85%), fae enterococci (8,50%) e enterococcius galluminar (0,65%).
pert_mt: Il presente studio non è stato condotto per rivedere la prevalenza e identificare le opzioni terapeutiche per le infezioni enterococciche nosocomie nel nostro ospedale di cure terziarie. I isolati identificati dalle caratteristiche morfologiche e biochimiche sono stati testati per la suscettibilità agli antibiotici utilizzando il metodo kirby-bauer.153 dei 2096 campioni clinici positivi della cultura composti da 101 urine , 30 tamponi / pus , 13 isolati di sangue e 09 tamponi vaginali sono stati identificati come faecalis enterococci (90,85%), fae enterococci (8,50%) e enterococcius galluminar (0,65%).
bt: The present study has not been conducted to review the prevalence and identify the therapeutic options for nosocomial enterococci infections in our tertiary care hospital.The isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using the kirby-bauer method.153 of the 2096 positive clinical samples of the culture composed of 101 urine, 30 tampons/pus, 13 blood isolates and 09 vaginal tampons were identified as faecalis enterococci (90.85%), fae enterococci (8.50%) and enterococcius galluminar (0.65%).
questions_src: What is the name of the Kirby-Bauer method used for antibiotic susceptibility testing?
Who caused 8.45% of all nosocomial infections according to the study?
Where were the isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics from?
Which species of enterococci made up the majority of the identified isolates?
When was the study conducted at the tertiary care hospital?

src: purposein the absence of head - to - head clinical trials comparing the once - daily , long - acting beta2-agonists olodaterol and indacaterol for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( copd ) , an indirect treatment comparison by systematic review and synthesis of the available clinical evidence was conducted.methodsa systematic literature review of randomized , controlled clinical trials in patients with copd was performed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol . network meta - analysis and adjusted indirect comparison methods were employed to evaluate treatment efficacy , using outcomes based on trough forced expiratory volume in 1 second ( fev1 ) , transition dyspnea index , st george s respiratory questionnaire total score and response , rescue medication use , and proportion of patients with exacerbations.resultseighteen trials were identified for meta - analysis ( eight , olodaterol ; ten , indacaterol ) . olodaterol trials included patients of all severities , whilst indacaterol trials excluded patients with very severe copd .
mt: In assenza di studi clinici testa a testa che confrontassero gli agonisti beta2-long-acting olodaterolo e indacaterolo una volta al giorno per il trattamento della malattia polmonare ostrutiva cronica (COPD), è stato condotto un confronto indiretto di trattamento attraverso la revisione sistematica e la sintesi delle prove cliniche disponibili.Si è condotto un esame sistematico della letteratura di studi clinici randomizzati e controllati su pazienti affetti da COPD per valutare l'efficacia e la sicurezza di olodaterolo e indacaterolo .
pert_mt: In assenza di studi clinici testa a testa che confrontassero gli agonisti beta2-long-acting olodaterolo e indacaterolo una volta al giorno per il trattamento della malattia polmonare ostrutiva cronica (COPD), non è stato condotto un confronto indiretto di trattamento attraverso la revisione sistematica e la sintesi delle prove cliniche disponibili.Si è condotto un esame sistematico della letteratura di studi clinici randomizzati e controllati su pazienti affetti da COPD per valutare l'efficacia e la sicurezza di olodaterolo e indacaterolo .
bt: In the absence of clinical trials, a test-to-test that compares beta2-long-acting olodaterolo agonists and indacaterolo once a day for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) has not been conducted through a systematic review and synthesis of available clinical evidence.A systematic review of the literature of randomized and controlled clinical trials on COPD patients has been conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterolo and indacaterolo .
questions_src: What is the main purpose of the study mentioned in the sentence?
Who conducted the systematic literature review and what were their findings regarding olodaterol and indacaterol?
Where were the randomized, controlled clinical trials conducted for the evaluation of efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol?
When was the systematic literature review performed according to the sentence?
Which outcomes were used in the network meta-analysis and adjusted indirect comparison methods to evaluate treatment efficacy?
answers_bt: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol
A systematic review of the literature of randomized and controlled clinical trials
According to the sentence, it was performed through a systematic review and synthesis of available clinical evidence

src: concurrent anterior segment optical coherence tomography ( oct ) was performed , and fixable fluorescent dextrans were introduced into the eye for histologic analysis of angiographically positive and negative areas . experimentally , some eyes ( n = 11 ) first received icg aqueous angiography to determine angiographic patterns . these eyes then underwent trabecular micro - bypass sham or stent placement in regions initially devoid of angiographic signal .
mt: Fu eseguita una tomografia di coerenza ottica del segmento anteriore (oct) simultanea e fu introdotta nell'occhio la dextrans fluorescente fissabile per l'analisi istologica delle aree angiograficamente positive e negative . Sperimentale , alcuni occhi (n = 11) ricevettero per la prima volta l' angiografia acquosa icg per determinare i modelli angiografici . Questi occhi furono poi sottoposti a micro-bypass trabecolare o a posizionamento stent in regioni inizialmente prive di segnale angiografico .
pert_mt: Fu eseguita una tomografia di coerenza acustica del segmento anteriore (oct) simultanea e fu introdotta nell'occhio la dextrans fluorescente fissabile per l'analisi istologica delle aree angiograficamente positive e negative. Sperimentale, alcuni occhi (n = 11) non ricevettero per la prima volta l'angiografia acquosa ICG per determinare i modelli angiografici. Questi occhi furono poi sottoposti a micro-bypass trabecolare o a posizionamento stent in regioni inizialmente prive di segnale angiografico.
bt: A simultaneous acoustic coherence tomography of the anterior segment (oct) was performed and the fixed fluorescent dextrans was introduced into the eye for the histological analysis of angiographically positive and negative areas.Experimentally, some eyes (n = 11) that did not receive the first time the angiography acquired ICG to determine angiographic models were then subjected to trabecular micro-bypass or stent positioning in regions initially deprived of angiographic signals.

Which angiographic pattern was determined by icg aqueous angiography?
How many eyes received icg angiography as part of the experiment?

Regions initially devoid of angiographic signal
answers_bt: Fixed fluorescent dextrans were introduced into the eye
